stimulusHtml: Which of the following is most easily determined from the data in the data set?

features.html:
A retail store has a data set that contains the following information for each sales transaction.Â 

  • Store location

  • Transaction date

  • Time of purchase

  • Sales amount, in dollars

  • Product category (electronics, clothing, home goods, grocery, etc.)

choicesHtml: Customer purchasing preferences by category for each store location
Customer satisfaction levels by category for each date
The name of the most popular product at each location
The quantity available for each product at each store location
